content: When you buy a house as a primary residence, you're able to put as low as 3% down, rather than the typical 20-25%. You'll also get a much lower interest rate compared to an investment loan. This makes house hacking much more accessible and amplifies your rate of return. The superb financing is arguably the biggest hack of house hacking
